name: Dragon Ball Z Super Butoden 2
description:
Who's Ready to kick some more butt against 3 new opponents?

Get ready to challenge 3 new opponents in Dragon Ball Z Super Butoden 2. Face new challenges and opponents such as the mighty Bojack. The quick and tough to beat Cell Jr. And the legendary super Saiyan himself......BROLY!!!!

A total of 12 fighters is available for you to control and master as you take on new stages and new opponents. But beware as we mentioned Broly is waiting for you at the end.
